value:
Believe and entrust everything...
Your hopes, your ambitions...
Surrender them to the inevitable.

This false connection does not make
us close. A true bond connects souls
across worlds, age, and death.

I don't recall accepting your
friendship. I am only helping
you to polish my skill.

Naga's followers have spread
even here...

Do not concern yourself with
$Nf...
The obvious result.
Not bad. But I'm not satisfied.

I must live up to Master Grima's
expectations of me...

With this power, I will pile the
corpses high...all in the name
of Master Grima.

My name? Does it matter? Master
Grima will decide all our fates. But if
you insist, you may call me Morgan.

Let me be blunt with you,
$Nu...$k$pI cannot betray the foundations
of my soul for you.$k$pI help you because of our contract,
and I will continue to.$k$pBut if you ever move to destroy
my foundation, I will never forgive
you for it.$k$pAnd not only will you be my foe,
but every other Hero will be as well.
I will fight you all if I have to.$k$pLet's hope it doesn't come to that.
それっ！
迷いません！
きゃあっ！
I cannot lose...
Any punishment you see fit.
I am prepared.
I will oppose you!
You shall fall by my hand!
Forgive me, Master...
chuckle
About my father... No. I must not speak out of turn.
Aah! Y-you tried to strike me down just now!
I know where my allegiance lies.
My will, my choices. No matter what you do to me, I shall act as I believe.
Master Grima, I'll never betray you. I'll stay by your side no matter what form you take.
Up until now, my faith was unshakable. I was ready to kill my own friends...
You remind me of the kind and gentle father I once knew...
Very well.
What is your plan?
Show me.
